statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 2 , -6 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x - 3 , 8 \, x^{3} + 14 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x + 11 , -3 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 2 , 7 \, x^{3} + 13 \, x^{2} - 14 \, x + 11\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
